kpi.name: M8001C408

kpi_info.title: Number of transmissions with bundle size 4 NACK on PDSCH using MCS18
kpi_info.use: The number of negative acknowledged transmissions with bundle size 4 using MCS18 on PDSCH. Only TBs with bundle NACK should be counted. UPDATED: The counter is updated in each TTI scheduling period when bundle NACK received on PDSCH using bundle size 3 from MCS18.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of transmissions with bundle size 4 NACK on PDSCH using MCS18
